'''''SEVEN 33''''' is the thirty-third volume of the [[Marion E. Wade Center]]'s annual journal ''[[SEVEN]]'', published in [[2016]].<ref name="jstor" />
==Contents==
* Remembrances:
** David Lavery remembered by Jane Hipolito

** By: Dabney Park
